Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards

package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Card
    this is the abstract class of all the cards
    CardInHand
    This class is the abstract class for the cards that are in the hand of the player
    CardLookUp<T extends Card>
    This class is used to look up cards by their id.
    CardTable
    This class is used to retrieve any type of card from the corresponding CardLookUp being ResourceCard, ObjectiveCard, StartCard or GoldCard.
    CardWithCorners
     
    GoldCard
    This class is the representation of the GoldCard in the game
    ObjectiveCard
    this class represents an objective card
    ResourceCard
    This class represents a resource card.
    StartCard
    This class represents the Start Card, the card that is given to each player at the beginning of the game.
